heading: This Afternoon
text: A rising chance of showers west of the Greens, chance east.

heading: Tonight
text: Windy. Evening showers, some mountain snow showers late.0s

heading: Tuesday
text: Again windy. Chance of rain or snow showers in the northern mountains.
temperature: Mid 40s to lower 50s north, low to mid 50s south

heading: Wednesday
temperature: Mid 40s to around 50 north, upper 40s to mid 50s south
